sentences.sContent: She inveigles Paco into a plot to swindle Tania out of her savings.
sentences.sCn: 她把帕科诱骗进了一个骗取塔尼娅积蓄的阴谋里。

remMethod.val: in + veigle(看作veil， 面纱) → 盖上面纱 → 诱骗

trans.tranOther: If you inveigle someone into doing something, you cleverly persuade them to do it when they do not really want to
